name: All Out (DenPaul)
description:
Hi, This is my submission for the Brackeys Game Jam and my 2nd Game Jam

(For some reason the URP wont load and the screen wont fit)

Controls & Features

Move - A & D or Arrow Keys

Jump - Space Bar

Once you captured the Red spirit, you are able to shoot projectiles by clicking your left mouse button

Once you captured the Yellow spirit, you are able to double jump.

Theme

Capturing the spirits will give you special abilities, additional health and increased speed.
